name: Starcom (Editions Mondiales S.A.)
overview: Pseudo 3D shooter developed by Mandfredi Doninico and published by Editions Mondiales S.A. in their French magazine Tilt. Found in: TILT No37 Decembre 1986. The enemy army is attacking you with dizzying speed. Devilishly aggressive ships are charging at you. You can only advance, defend yourself as well as possible by praying to the sky that you don't run out of ammunition. An extraordinarily nerve-wracking game
